abstract: As Wall Street moves to shed jobs by the thousands, Capital One, whose planned acquisition of ING Direct USA has drawn scrutiny, trumpeted its plans to hire more than 3,600 new employees in 2011.
snippet: As Wall Street moves to shed jobs by the thousands, Capital One, whose planned acquisition of ING Direct USA has drawn scrutiny, trumpeted its plans to hire more than 3,600 new employees in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Capital One, under fire from consumer groups and competitors for its $9 billion bid to acquire ING Direct USA, is hoping to sweeten the deal and stem the controversy with a big promise: job creation.

headline.main: Capital One Says ING Direct Deal Will Create Jobs
